goal.ch: Teach students with no or limited programming experience about basic Python and how to use Python for various scientific tasks: curve fitting, numerical integration, and solving ordinary differential equations, etc ...
goal.en: Teach students with no or limited programming experience about basic Python and how to use Python for various scientific tasks: curve fitting, numerical integration, and solving ordinary differential equations, etc ...

outline.ch: Setup Python environment, basic python, numpy, scipy, panda
outline.en: Setup Python environment, basic python, numpy, scipy, panda

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills
